body.p: To the Hon Thomas E Bramlette Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Your Petitioner James Hardin States that Some 11 years ago he went the of Bail of Peter C Adams in the Fayette Circuit Court ^to the amount of $500.^ and that said Adams left for parts unknown and at the Feb term 1853 the Bond was forfeited, and he stands convicted in the Fayette Circuit Court and is a poor man. A Strictly Loyal citizen and a Pensioner of the War of 1812 and is 69 years old. and asks your Honor to remit his fine
We the undersigned citizens of Rockcastle County state that we are well acquainted with James Hardin and know the facts stated above to be true and ask your Honor to remit his fine

W M Fish Clk of the Rockcastle County Court
